attributes.attribute: An eye-catching tension banner stand ideal for retail or exhibition environments. The telescopic support pole enables the height of the graphic to vary up to a maximum of 2150mm
Stylish and designer look;Lightweight anodised silver/blue components;Stable tripod style base;Telescopic pole for adjustable graphic height;Quick to assemble and easy to use

Specifically designed for indoor and outdoor promotions or high traffic areas of display Blizzard’s moulded base can be filled with either water or sand to provide stability in adverse weather conditions

Ideal for point of sale, retail display or exhibition environments;Stylish design hollow plastic base for water or sand weighting agent;Fully adjustable graphic height and width;Graphic supported on simple eyelet system;Weather resistant;<STRONG>Recommended Carry Bag</STRONG> <FONT color=#ff0000>AB140</FONT>

A popular and versatile tension wire banner system with a distinctively shaped foot that combines good looks with stability. Additional wire fixings and poles are available, making it simple to create displays using several banners.

Maximum visible graphic area 1800mm (h) x 600mm (w);Available in black powdercoated finish;Fully adjustable tension wires;Supports a wide variety of media;Single or multiple graphics in one drop;Highly portable;Supplied with carry bag;<strong>Please note that the 600mm width unit is an Off the Shelf item</strong>
Boomerang Mural kit allows 3 individual graphics to be displayed

Utilises two single Boomerang banner stands;Additional rails and fixings are supplied;Available in black powdercoated finish;Maximum visible graphic area 1800mm (h) x 600mm (w);Supplied with two carry bags

item.title: Dash Mega - 1000mm wide is Being discontinued

attributes.attribute: A highly portable, versatile and cost effective telescopic tripod banner stand that is lightweight, very stable and simple to use. The telescopic support pole enables the user to vary the height of the graphic up to a maximum of 2.4 metres

<FONT color=#ff0000>Please note that the 5% price freeze is for the 800mm wide only</FONT>;Visible Graphic Area 2400mm (h) x 800 or 1000mm (while stocks last) (w);Lightweight anodised silver components;Wide base tripod foot;3 part telescopic pole for adjustable graphic height;Option to add literature holder (see recommended accessories);Quick to assemble and easy to use;Includes Carry bag/tube;Dash mega can be converted to a twin sided banner stand, simply order a 2nd set of rails (see recommended accessories);<STRONG><FONT color=#ff0000>Please note: 1000mm width unit stocked in the UK only</FONT></STRONG>;<STRONG>Please note that the 1000mm width unit is Custom Made to Order</STRONG>

Horizon is the biggest graphic carrier in the range with a graphic area of up to 6m single or double sided. It's the ideal promotional solution for outdoor events, advertisements, exhibitions and public areas such as airports and shopping malls. Several units can be linked together as a seamless wall to make an even bigger impact

Indoor or outdoor, single or double sided banner system;Telescopic poles for adjustable graphic height up to a maximum of 2400mm approx;2500mm approx graphic width;Individual units can be joined together;Hollow feet for water or sand weighting for total stability;Quick to assemble;<STRONG>Recommended Carry Bags</STRONG> <FONT color=#ff0000>AB195A</FONT> and <FONT color=#ff0000>AB195B</FONT> (Product requires both bags, see recommended accessories)
A highly portable, versatile and cost effective banner stand that is lightweight, very stable and simple to use

<FONT color=#ff0000>Please note that the 5% price freeze is for the 1000mm wide only</FONT>;Available in 3 widths: 400 (while stocks last), 800 or 1000mm (400mm width also available in 2 heights);Quick to assemble and easy to use;Lightweight aluminium components;Snap frame rails enable easy graphic changes;Bungee pole provides consistant graphic height;Includes carry bag;Available in anodised silver;<STRONG>Please note that the 400mm width unit is Custom Made to Order</STRONG>

<FONT color=#ff0000><STRONG>Soon to be released, catalogue orders will be made active when stock is available.</STRONG></FONT> A highly portable, versatile and cost effective double-sided banner stand that is lightweight, very stable and simple to use

Visible Graphic Area 1985mm (h) x 800mm (w);Quick to assemble and easy to use;Lightweight anodised aluminium components;Snap frame rails enable easy graphic changes;Bungee pole provides consistant graphic height;Includes carry bag/tube

A large format double sided banner ‘A’ frame made from lightweight aluminium, ideal for use with PVC eyelet banners. The Monsoon is very easy to use, is reusable and is the perfect graphics carrier for venues, events, exhibitions, promotions and indoor or outdoor shows.

Indoor or outdoor banner system;Suitable for single or double sided display;2 frame sizes 1000mm x 2500mm and 1250mm x 3000mm;Extension kits available;Natural finish 25mm (1") square aluminium tubes with reinforced plastic mouldings;Easy push-fit assembly, no tools necessary;Graphics are secured to the frame with elastic bungee cords;Supplied complete with carry bag;Flat packs for easy transportation;Recommend AB120C banner tube to transport graphics <FONT color=#ff0000><STRONG>NB AB120C is suitable for transporting graphics only and not the Monsoon hardware</STRONG></FONT>
Pegasus is the largest format tension banner in the range, ideal for any exhibition environment.

Telescopic pole with adjustable height and width;Lightweight components;Breaks down easily for transportation;Cost effective;Silver powdercoated;Maximum visible graphic area 2435mm (h) x 2410mm (w);Minimum visible graphic area 860mm (h) x 1330mm (w);Includes Carry bag

Storm Hydro 2 is built for durability and strength and is ideal for indoor or outdoor promotions. The moulded base can be filled with either water or sand, making it especially suitable for high traffic areas indoors or poor weather conditions outdoors.

Suitable for or indoor or outdoor use;Visible graphic size 1800mm high x 800mm wide approx;Can be used as a double or single sided unit;Ideal for point of sale, retail display or exhibitions;Moulded plastic base for water or sand weighting;Supported on a simple eyelet system;Weather resistant;Supplied with carry bag;Designed to withstand approximate wind speeds of 13-18 miles per hour (Beaufort scale 4);Recommend AB120M 850mm (h) x 150mm dia Banner tube/bag to transport graphics safely, please see recommended accessories

Stylish ‘designer’ foot with polished finish and protective anti-slip pad;Compact yet very stable;Deluxe three part twist & lock pole will lock to any height 870-2100mm;Snap frame rails enable easy graphic changes;2 widths available;Includes quality carry bag;Joining bars available;Visible graphic area: 870-2100mm (h) x 800 or 1000mm (w)

A very popular and highly versatile telescopic banner stand that is lightweight, portable and very simple to use. With six width options and adjustable height, the Uno is flexible enough to carry a wide variety of graphics.

<FONT color=#ff0000>Please note that the 5% price freeze is for the 1000mm wide only</FONT>;Visible Graphic area 2200mm max (h) x 400-1500mm (w) approx;Minimum height 850mm approx;Available in Black powdercoated finish;Lightweight components;Telescopic pole for adjustable height;Quick to assemble and easy to use;Includes carry bag/tube;Units can join together to form a seamless graphic wall;<STRONG><FONT color=#ff0000>Please note: 800mm width units are stocked in the UK and at European Hubs. All other widths are stocked in the UK only.</FONT></STRONG>;<STRONG>Please note that the 800mm and 1000mm width units are Off the Shelf items</STRONG>

Create additional impact with our tallest banner stand at 2.9 metres high. Simple yet effective quality telescopic banner stand.With five width options and adjustable height, the Uno 2.9 is flexible enough to carry a wide variety of graphics.

Visible Graphic area 2900mm (h) x 600-1500mm (w);Available in Black powdercoated finish;Lightweight components;Telescopic pole for adjustable height;Quick to assemble and easy to use;Includes carry bag/tube;Units can join together to form a seamless graphic wall
The popular Uno tension banner is now available to use with a fabric panel, ideal for attaching documents using hook and look fastener.

A highly portable 'X' style tension banner, capable of displaying an 1800 x 800mm graphic.
